links.title: Laravel Octane
links.description: I am so excited to try Laravel Octane when it's released: a package to use Swoole or Roadrunner with Laravel and boost your app performance.

links.title: The Internet Archive infrastructure
links.description: Ever wondered how the Internet Archive looks under the coat? Jonah Edwards shares some details about their servers.

links.title: How to build a billion dollar audio app in a weekend
links.description: An interesting story about the build process of a Clubhouse clone, which was built in a couple of days.

links.title: The Kilobyte’s Gambit
links.description: Can you beat 1024 bytes of JavaScript in this chess game?

links.title: „User Engagement“ is Code for „Addiction“
links.description: A great article about recent application design that is worrisome and affects everyone.

links.title: Six secret GitHub Easter Eggs
links.description: UP UP DOWN DOWN LEFT RIGHT LEFT RIGHT B A - What Easter eggs can you find on GitHub?

links.title: How to make badass shadows
links.description: Creating shadows for elements are some sort of art when it comes to looking realistic and "sexy".

links.title: Image optimization for the web in 2021
links.description: An absolutely great guide by Malte Ubl about maximizing image optimization for your websites in 2021.

links.title: Managing your DNS with Github
links.description: Sven Luijten compiled an interesting article about managing your DNS entries with Github Actions.
